title: ‘For victory! Are you ready?’: Netanyahu visits troops at Gaza border
description: “We are going to win with all our might,” Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu told IDF soldiers stationed at the Gaza border ahead of an expected ground offensive against Hamas.

title: Experts on how the laws of war apply to Hamas and the Israeli military
Woman speaks out after learning two relatives feared taken by Hamas are dead
description: Abbey Onn speaks with Lester Holt after learning that two of her relatives, believed to have been taken by Hamas, are dead. She's holding onto hope for more of her family members and others taken hostage. Follow the latest reporting from inside Israel tonight on “NBC Nightly News with Lester Holt” at 6:30 pm ET / 5:30 pm CT.

title: Israel is primed for a Gaza ground assault soon, ex-leader says, despite delays and concerns
description: A ground assault on the Gaza Strip is likely in the coming days, former Israeli Prime Minister Ehud Barak told NBC News, despite mounting fury in the Arab world over a deadly hospital blast that has intensified fears of broader escalation in the region.

title: U.S. says Egypt will open Rafah border crossing for Gaza aid
description: President Biden said the U.S. will provide 100 million dollars in aid amid the surge in violence in the Israel-Hamas war. NBC News’ Jay Gray reports on the impending aid for Gazans and the escalation in the Israel-Hamas war.

title: 'We should stop this madness and start talking,' Jordan's foreign minister says
description: NBC News' Lester Holt asked Jordanian Foreign Minister Ayman Safadi why President Biden's summit with Arab leaders had been called off. The minister also voiced fears of the war between Israel and Hamas spreading to a wider conflict.

title: Video shows purported airstrikes near Gaza’s Al-Quds hospital
description: Footage released by the Palestine Red Crescent Society shows explosions in the vicinity of the  Al-Quds hospital in Gaza City, which houses more than 8,000 displaced persons.

title: Video shows aftermath of deadly explosion at U.N.-run school in Khan Younis
description: Children were among the victims of a deadly explosion that struck the Ahmed Abdelaziz School in Khan Younis, Gaza, on Wednesday night.

title: Thousands of protesters try to march on the Israeli Embassy in Amman
description: Jordanian security forces dispersed demonstrators outside al-Kalouti Mosque in Amman and prevented them from marching toward the nearby Israeli Embassy building.

title: Russia’s foreign minister thanks North Korea for ‘unwavering’ support of its war in Ukraine
description: Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov thanked North Korea for its support for Russia’s war on Ukraine as he arrived in Pyongyang on Wednesday.
